review: *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** She unbelievably has so much of patience to hear the smallest of issues the parents bring to her, she explains so well & gives  a comprehensive advice in a very meaningful structured manner, so can be well understood by the parents. l would highly recommend this doctor for any child who has any issues. My sincere thanks to the doctor for addressing our concerns so well.
